This situation necessitates that the ego car maintains a safe distance from the truck or refrains from changing lanes to the right to ensure safety.

Additionally, several other vehicles are observed ahead, occupying all lanes and moving in the same direction as the ego car. The positioning of these vehicles directly in the path of the ego car requires careful adjustment of speed and following distance by the ego car to maintain a safe driving environment, ensuring that a safe distance is kept at all times to prevent any potential accidents.

Furthermore, a traffic light is visible ahead, positioned over the intersection, displaying red signals for the direction in which the ego car is traveling.
